product_overview: Continuum is a personal-first knowledge graph platform that captures, preserves, and lets users search technical decision traces (the reasoning, options, and rationale behind choices). It provides ingestion from Claude Code logs, AI-guided interview capture, hybrid search, and entity resolution backed by Neo4j and PostgreSQL.
core_goals: Capture and persist decision traces (what, why, alternatives) from conversations and interviews
Provide accurate entity resolution and a consistent knowledge graph for retrieval and reasoning
Enable fast hybrid search (lexical + semantic) over decisions and entities
Support AI-guided capture sessions to elicit tacit knowledge interactively
Expose APIs for ingestion, analytics, project scoping, and export while maintaining per-user isolation

features.name: Health Check
features.description: Basic health and readiness endpoints for monitoring service liveness and readiness.
user_flows: Send GET request to /health -> Receive 200 OK with basic health payload
Send GET request to /health/ready -> Receive 200 OK indicating readiness
Send GET request to /health -> Receive non-200 (e.g., 503) -> Observe service unhealthy and surface incident

features.name: Dashboard Statistics
features.description: Retrieve aggregated dashboard statistics including counts for decisions, entities, sessions, and recent decisions.
user_flows: Send GET request to /api/dashboard/stats -> Receive 200 with total decisions, entities, sessions, and recent decisions
Send GET request to /api/dashboard/stats -> Receive 200 but notice data is not scoped to the requesting user (anonymous user_id limitation)
Send GET request to /api/dashboard/stats while DB unavailable -> Receive 503 Service Unavailable

features.name: Decision Management
features.description: Create, list, read, update, delete, and surface decisions that need human review.
user_flows: Send GET request to /api/decisions -> Receive 200 with list of decisions
Send POST request to /api/decisions with valid decision payload -> Receive 201 with decision_id
Send GET request to /api/decisions/{decision_id} -> Receive 200 with decision details
Send PUT request to /api/decisions/{decision_id} with updated fields -> Receive 200 with updated decision
Send DELETE request to /api/decisions/{decision_id} -> Receive 204 No Content
Send GET request to /api/decisions/needs-review -> Receive 200 with decisions flagged for review
Send POST request to /api/decisions with missing required fields -> Receive 400 Bad Request with validation errors
Send GET request to /api/decisions/{decision_id} with non-existent id -> Receive 404 Not Found

features.name: Entity Management
features.description: Manage entities in the knowledge graph: create, read, update, delete, suggest, and link entities to decisions.
user_flows: Send GET request to /api/entities -> Receive 200 with list of entities
Send POST request to /api/entities with valid entity payload -> Receive 201 with entity_id
Send GET request to /api/entities/{entity_id} -> Receive 200 with entity details
Send PUT request to /api/entities/{entity_id} with updates -> Receive 200 with updated entity
Send DELETE request to /api/entities/{entity_id} -> Receive 204 No Content
Send POST request to /api/entities/suggest with partial text -> Receive 200 with suggested entity candidates
Send POST request to /api/entities/link with decision_id and entity_id -> Receive 200 confirming link created
Send POST request to /api/entities with ambiguous/colliding data -> Receive 409 Conflict or 400 with explanation (duplicate/canonicalization issue)
Send GET request to /api/entities/{entity_id} with invalid id -> Receive 404 Not Found

features.name: Knowledge Graph Operations
features.description: Query and validate the Neo4j knowledge graph, retrieve nodes, source files, and perform hybrid/semantic searches against the graph.
user_flows: Send GET request to /api/graph -> Receive 200 with paginated graph nodes and relationships
Send GET request to /api/graph/all -> Receive 200 with full graph export payload
Send GET request to /api/graph/stats -> Receive 200 with graph statistics
Send GET request to /api/graph/validate -> Receive 200 with validation report (circular dependencies, orphans)
Send GET request to /api/graph/sources -> Receive 200 with list of source files
Send GET request to /api/graph/nodes/{node_id} -> Receive 200 with node details
Send POST request to /api/graph/search/hybrid with query -> Receive 200 with fused lexical+semantic ranked results
Send POST request to /api/graph/search/semantic with query -> Receive 200 with semantic vector search results
Send POST request to /api/graph/search/hybrid with malformed body -> Receive 400 Bad Request
Send GET request to /api/graph/nodes/{node_id} with unknown node_id -> Receive 404 Not Found

features.name: Search Functionality
features.description: Search decisions and entities and get search suggestions for faster query composition.
user_flows: Send GET request to /api/search?query=database+migration -> Receive 200 with matching decisions and entities ranked
Send GET request to /api/search/suggest?prefix=Post -> Receive 200 with suggestion list
Send GET request to /api/search with empty query -> Receive 400 Bad Request or empty result set
Send GET request to /api/search?query=rare-term -> Receive 200 with low-confidence/zero results

features.name: Capture Sessions
features.description: Create and manage AI-guided interview capture sessions, add messages during the session, and complete sessions to extract decisions.
user_flows: Send POST request to /api/capture/sessions with session metadata -> Receive 201 with session_id
Send GET request to /api/capture/sessions/{session_id} -> Receive 200 with session details
Send POST request to /api/capture/sessions/{session_id}/messages with user message -> Receive 200 with assistant response and extracted entities
Send POST request to /api/capture/sessions/{session_id}/complete -> Receive 200 with processed decision_id
Send POST request to /api/capture/sessions/{session_id}/messages where session_id is invalid -> Receive 404 Not Found
Send POST request to /api/capture/sessions/{session_id}/complete before any messages -> Receive 400 Bad Request or empty extraction result

features.name: Data Ingestion
features.description: Trigger ingestion of Claude Code logs, check ingestion status, and list available projects and files for import.
user_flows: Send POST request to /api/ingest/trigger with selected files -> Receive 202 Accepted with job_id
Send GET request to /api/ingest/status?job_id={job_id} -> Receive 200 with job progress and success/failure summary
Send GET request to /api/ingest/projects -> Receive 200 with list of available projects
Send GET request to /api/ingest/files?project={name} -> Receive 200 with list of files for import
Send POST request to /api/ingest/trigger with invalid payload -> Receive 400 Bad Request
Send GET request to /api/ingest/status with unknown job_id -> Receive 404 Not Found

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Register, authenticate, and get the current user profile (note: current implementation uses anonymous user_id for many endpoints).
user_flows: Send POST request to /api/users/register with valid credentials -> Receive 201 Created with user_id
Send POST request to /api/users/login with valid credentials -> Receive 200 with auth token
Send GET request to /api/users/me with auth token -> Receive 200 with current user profile
Send DELETE request to /api/users/me with auth token -> Receive 204 account deleted
Send POST request to /api/users/login with wrong password -> Receive 401 Unauthorized
Send GET request to /api/users/me without token -> Receive 401 Unauthorized or anonymous profile (current limitation)

features.name: Analytics
features.description: Provide analytics endpoints for decision timelines, coverage statistics, and identifying stale decisions.
user_flows: Send GET request to /api/analytics/timeline -> Receive 200 with timeline data for decisions
Send GET request to /api/analytics/coverage -> Receive 200 with coverage statistics
Send GET request to /api/analytics/stale -> Receive 200 with list of stale decisions
Send GET request to /api/analytics/timeline while DB query times out -> Receive 504 Gateway Timeout

features.name: Agent Context and Summary
features.description: Retrieve agent-generated summaries and contextual data used by AI agents for extraction and assistance.
user_flows: Send GET request to /api/agent/summary -> Receive 200 with aggregated agent summary
Send POST request to /api/agent/context with context request payload -> Receive 200 with context bundle
Send POST request to /api/agent/context with malformed payload -> Receive 400 Bad Request

features.name: Project Management
features.description: List, inspect statistics for, and delete projects to scope decision data and ingestion.
user_flows: Send GET request to /api/projects -> Receive 200 with list of projects
Send GET request to /api/projects/{name}/stats -> Receive 200 with project statistics
Send DELETE request to /api/projects/{name} -> Receive 204 No Content
Send DELETE request to /api/projects/{name} for non-existent project -> Receive 404 Not Found

features.name: Export and Notifications
features.description: Export decision data and retrieve system notifications relevant to the user or project.
user_flows: Send POST request to /api/export/export with export parameters -> Receive 200 with export link or file reference
Send GET request to /api/notifications -> Receive 200 with list of notifications
Send POST request to /api/export/export with unsupported format -> Receive 400 Bad Request

routes.description: Get, update, or delete a specific decision
Get decisions that need human review
Get, update, or delete a specific entity

features.name: Health Check
features.description: Basic health and readiness endpoints for monitoring
user_interactions: Send GET request to /health
Send GET request to /health/ready

features.name: Dashboard Statistics
features.description: Get dashboard statistics including decision counts, entity counts, and recent decisions
user_interactions: Send GET request to /api/dashboard/stats
Receive dashboard statistics with total decisions, entities, sessions, and recent decisions

user_interactions: Send GET request to list decisions
Send POST request to create a new decision
Send GET request with decision_id to get specific decision
Send PUT request to update a decision
Send DELETE request to delete a decision
Send GET request to /api/decisions/needs-review to get decisions needing review

Send POST request to create an entity
Send GET request with entity_id to get specific entity
Send PUT request to update an entity
Send DELETE request to delete an entity
Send POST request to /api/entities/link to link entities
Send POST request to /api/entities/suggest to get suggestions

user_interactions: Send GET request to /api/graph to get paginated graph
Send GET request to /api/graph/all to get full graph
Send GET request to /api/graph/stats for statistics
Send GET request to /api/graph/validate to validate graph
Send GET request to /api/graph/sources to get source files
Send GET request to /api/graph/nodes/{node_id} to get specific node
Send POST request to /api/graph/search/hybrid for hybrid search
Send POST request to /api/graph/search/semantic for semantic search

features.name: Search Functionality
features.description: Search decisions and entities
user_interactions: Send GET request with query parameter to search
Send GET request to /api/search/suggest for suggestions

features.name: Capture Sessions
features.description: Create and manage AI-guided interview capture sessions
user_interactions: Send POST request to create a capture session
Send GET request with session_id to get session details
Send POST request to add messages to session
Send POST request to complete a session

features.name: Data Ingestion
features.description: Ingest Claude Code logs and manage ingestion process
user_interactions: Send POST request to trigger ingestion
Send GET request to check ingestion status
Send GET request to get list of projects
Send GET request to get list of files

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: User registration and authentication
user_interactions: Send POST request to register new user
Send POST request to login
Send GET request to /api/users/me to get current user profile
Send DELETE request to /api/users/me to delete account

features.name: Analytics
features.description: Get analytics including timeline, coverage, and stale decisions
user_interactions: Send GET request to /api/analytics/timeline for timeline data
Send GET request to /api/analytics/coverage for coverage stats
Send GET request to /api/analytics/stale for stale decisions

features.name: Agent Context
features.description: Get AI agent context and summaries
user_interactions: Send GET request to get agent summary
Send POST request to get agent context

features.name: Project Management
features.description: Manage projects and project statistics
user_interactions: Send GET request to list projects
Send GET request with project name to get stats
Send DELETE request to delete project

known_limitations.issue: User authentication is not fully implemented - endpoints use anonymous user_id
known_limitations.impact: All users see the same data, no proper isolation

known_limitations.issue: WebSocket endpoints are not testable via standard HTTP tests
known_limitations.impact: Capture session WebSocket functionality cannot be tested with standard HTTP requests
